body_text: This looks odd - Addons and this are equivalent, it looks like, but it would be more obvious if we bound to the same thing we accessed the method on (so either Addons.serializeForSandbox.bind(Addons) or this.serializeForSandbox.bind(this)).
body: This looks odd - `Addons` and `this` are equivalent, it looks like, but it would be more obvious if we bound to the same thing we accessed the method on (so either `Addons.serializeForSandbox.bind(Addons)` or `this.serializeForSandbox.bind(this)`).
body_html: This looks odd - Addons and this are equivalent, it looks like, but it would be more obvious if we bound to the same thing we accessed the method on (so either Addons.serializeForSandbox.bind(Addons) or this.serializeForSandbox.bind(this)).
